exceptions.tactic: intros X q p HdecP HdecQ.
intros X' q p HdecP HdecQ.
intros X' q' p HdecP HdecQ.
intros X' q' p' HdecP HdecQ.
destruct HdecP as [fP HP], HdecQ as [fQ HQ].
exceptions.exn: The reference HdecP was not found in the current environment.

exceptions.tactic: exists (fun x : X => orb (fP x) (fQ x)).
exceptions.exn: The reference fQ was not found in the current environment.
The reference HP was not found in the current environment.
The reference HQ was not found in the current environment.
The reference fP was not found in the current environment.

original: intros X q p HdecP HdecQ. unfold decidable in HdecP, HdecQ. destruct HdecP as [fP HP], HdecQ as [fQ HQ]. exists (fun x : X => orb (fP x) (fQ x)). intros x. specialize (HP x). specialize (HQ x). destruct (fP x), (fQ x); firstorder.
